comment.indexationObject: Indexing an object, or the tree whose object is the root. Based on the PID, or list of PIDs inserted into the form, or read from a file
comment.indexationModel: Indexing of objects (and their trees) that have the selected model
comment.indexationNotIndexed: It has not been indexed yet
comment.indexationInProgressError: Complete indexing is in progress or complete indexing has not been completed properly
comment.indexationIndexed: Indexed by the current indexer version
comment.indexationIndexedObsolete: Indexed by an older version of the indexer
comment.indexationLoadMore: Continue browsing the repository and loading more objects
comment.indexationIndexInBulk: Index all currently displayed objects - each in its own process

removeFromThisCollection.title: Removal from collection
removeFromThisCollection.message: Do you really want to remove {{value1}} from the collection {{value2}}

removeCollection.title: Deleting a collection
removeCollection.message: Do you really want to permanently delete the collection

addItemsToCollection.title: Adding items to a collection
addItemsToCollection.message: For each PID entered, an item will be added to the collection. Part of adding each item to a collection is scheduling the indexing process, so collection membership may not be immediately apparent

addItemToCollection.titleCollection: Adding a collection to another collection
addItemToCollection.titleObject: Adding an object to a collection
addItemToCollection.messageCollection: This collection will be added to another collection. Part of adding to a collection involves scheduling the indexing process, so belonging to a collection may not be immediately apparent
addItemToCollection.messageObject: The object will be added to the collection. Part of adding to a collection involves scheduling the indexing process, so belonging to a collection may not be immediately apparent

removeRight.title: Removal of right
removeRight.message: You really want to remove the right

scheduleChangePolicyByPid.title: Visibility change
scheduleChangePolicyByPid.messageFixed: A Visibility Change process will be scheduled for the selected PID, which will set the POLICY flag of the object, possibly also its descendants.
scheduleChangePolicyByPid.messageNotFixed: For each inserted PID, a Change Visibility process will be scheduled, which will set the POLICY flag of the object, possibly also its descendants.

scheduleAddLicense.title: Adding a licensee
scheduleAddLicense.messageFixed: The Add License process will be scheduled for the selected PID
scheduleAddLicense.messageNotFixed: An Add License process will be scheduled for each PID inserted

scheduleRemoveLicense.title: License withdrawal
scheduleRemoveLicense.messageFixed: A License Removal process will be scheduled for the selected PID
scheduleRemoveLicense.messageNotFixed: A License Removal process will be scheduled for each PID entered

success.removeFromThisCollection: The item has been successfully removed from the collection
success.copyToClipboard: The text has been successfully copied to the clipboard

success.scheduleRemoveLicense: The License Withdrawal process has been scheduled
